CustomField.description: The unprorated amount that will bill each billing period. Equals ((TotalPrice * BillingFrequency) / (ProrateMultiplier * DefaultSubscriptionTerm)).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The unprorated amount that will bill each billing period. Equals ((TotalPrice * BillingFrequency) / (ProrateMultiplier * DefaultSubscriptionTerm)).
CustomField.label: Billable Unit Price
